extendedInfo.description: Echofon is the easy-to-use, super fast Twitter app that smartly syncs across all your devices. Wrapped in a beautiful, clean interface, Echofon for Android packs a punch, featuring gorgeous desktop widget, instant notifications, light and dark color themes and more â all the Twitter features you need to bring order to your busy social media life. Key Features:* Full-featured dashboard widgets* Sync between all your Echofon apps on Android or iOS devices so you never read a Tweet, @Mention or Direct Message twice * Mute Users* Background notifications alert you of new Direct Messages and @Mentions* Easily manage multiple Twitter accounts* Choose from light or battery-saving dark color themes* View threaded conversations all in one place to easily keep track of who said what* Full set of Twitter functionality: Tweet, Retweet, Direct Message, @Mention, lists* Offers photo previews right in your Twitter timelineComing soon* Gap detection* In-app browser/in-app picture viewerPlease reply to @echofonbeta with comments/questions/issues, because we can not reply to your reviews in Google Play. Otherwise you can leave your Twitter @username in your reviews, if you would like to be contacted from us regarding you questions/issues.

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: The profile pictures are blurry on timeline
reviews.author: Tabitha S.

reviews.title: Still lacking...
reviews.comment: Not all media types shown in preview, no gap detection. Why has it have to be so far behind the iOS version?
reviews.author: Jose Manuel Velazquez R.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: nice smooth app good interface simple and attractive. Needs to show if someone follows you currently only shows if you follow them. Click on profile pic should zoom. Both those are essential twitter functions so three stars until thats fixed. Also sometimes crashes when running in the background xperia U Gingerbread rooted.
reviews.author: Simon Jones

reviews.title: Samsung Note 2
reviews.comment: This way better than ubbersocial. It\'s simple and fast...
reviews.author: Marie Joan Cajes

reviews.title: Htc one
reviews.comment: Can\'t get into app, it gives me a pin to enter???  @drama_1983
reviews.author: Dion Laban

reviews.title: disapointed
reviews.comment: Please fix it. Very very wasted. Refund my money!!!
reviews.author: irvan irdhiansyah

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Cannot authorize the app I\'ve informed by email and waited a few weeks still cannot authorize on HTC One unbranded running 4.2.2 this needs fixing! I\'ve paid for an app that\'s broke
reviews.author: craig magee

reviews.title: I love the dark theme...
reviews.comment: My share from facebook didn\'t work, I\'m expecting more from the Pro version that I purchased, please fix.
reviews.author: Allen Wilson

reviews.title: Need to fix bug
reviews.comment: This is actually a nice app but sometimes it force closed on my samsung note.
reviews.author: DT Wardhani

reviews.title: Word to the wise!!!
reviews.comment: Please make sure you read the description thoroughly as to the features before  purchasing the Pro edition. Also make sure you take the free edition for a test to make sure you really like the app. Made grave mistake of just purchasing based on referral of friend and reviews WASNT what I wanted.
reviews.author: Jennifer Patterson Hill

reviews.title: ECHOFON PRO ANDROID
reviews.comment: Ive purchased the echofon pro version on the iphone+iPod platfom  EchofonPRO 4Android.Doesn\'t have the same features as on the ios.Is it not possible 2have all the features that the iPhone has?
reviews.author: Tasha Ramsey

reviews.title: CRASHING
reviews.comment: this app keeps crashing while i\'m trying to sign into my account PLEASE FIX OR UPDATE THIS APP ASAP
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than b4...
reviews.comment: Used to use ubersocial, but now I think i\'ll stick with this one, it\'s simple, I like it, oh ya, I think the internal browser would be a great feature ya
reviews.author: Rifki Hanif

reviews.title: Latest version is broken.
reviews.comment: I can\'t even login. The account gets stuck at the token level and won\'t complete account setup
reviews.author: Jay M

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: So much better than the official Twitter app & now without ads!
reviews.author: Ke\'Von Morrow

reviews.title: Just too many bugs
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app for years on iPhone and from the start on Android. Here every day there\'s a new bug, a new annoyance... and there are features missing :( I had enough with today\'s bug. Uninstalling :((
reviews.author: Miguel Murat

reviews.title: No profile avatars
reviews.comment: I had to reinstall after a factory wipe and it won\'t show any avatars in the timeline, just on profiles.
reviews.author: Chris Klosowski

reviews.title: It needs a few improvements
reviews.comment: I\'d like to be able to customize my 5 tabs on the bottom. I\'d also like to see how many retweets/favorites I or another person got on a tweet. And lastly, o lease fix the @ sign. The way its  half way cut off irritates me. Other than that, just make it more intuitive.
reviews.author: Tanner Lambert
